source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_00<tab>Yomei has a missive from the Far East with your name on it.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_00<tab>船着場の平屋のヨウメイは、冒険者に手紙を渡したいようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_01<tab>Yomei greets you upon arrival, and eagerly hands you a letter. It would appear that Oboro and Jacke have safely arrived on Hingan shores, and that their investigation into the stolen scroll has turned up some promising leads. Your shinobi friend and master bids you join him in Kugane to continue the search. After disembarking, seek out Oboro in the alley behind Pier #2.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_01<tab>ヨウメイから、オボロの手紙を渡された。クガネで巻物を盗んだ東方人を見つけたようだ。クガネの第二波止場にいる「オボロ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_02<tab>Oboro relates to you all that he and Jacke have learned. The theft of the scroll was apparently the work of the Garnet League, a band of masterless samurai who turned to banditry after having fled the battlefield in dishonor during the Doman uprising. Easily recognizable by their blood red garb and rough demeanor, they sojourn in Kugane of late. At Oboro's behest, spy upon them from the shadows of the Shiokaze Hostelry and the Rakuza District and see what knowledge you might glean of their plans, and of the scroll's current whereabouts.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_02<tab>オボロと話した。件の東方人たちは柘榴衆という落ち武者集団だという。ツバメも合流し、柘榴衆たちから情報を集めることになった。クガネの潮風亭と楽座街で「かくれる」を使って情報収集をしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_03<tab>Eavesdropping upon the Garnet League men, you manage to learn that they were hired to retrieve the scroll from an imperial storehouse by a Hingan client whose identity is not immediately evident. You also succeed in gathering more information on the Garnet League itself─namely, that it is led by one Zakuro Brightblood, a samurai feared for both her prowess with the blade and her nigh-legendary temper. Oboro and Jacke will doubtless be keen to hear all you have learned.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_03<tab>柘榴衆たちの話からすると、巻物はひんがしの国の者に依頼され、帝国から盗んだ物のようだ。第二波止場の「オボロ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_04<tab>You and your companions share what you have learned, when you are joined by V'kebbe and Underfoot, who have been summoned to Kugane by Jacke to assist in the recovery of the scroll. Piecing together random bits of information, Captain Jacke devises a convoluted scheme to recover the scroll that will involve a high-wire act and imitation bird droppings, among other curious elements. With no better course of action coming immediately to mind, tasks are delegated amongst your party, and you prepare to move into action.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_04<tab>オボロに報告した。巻物は頭領であるザクロが持っているようだ。ペリム・ハウリムとヴァ・ケビが合流し、巻物を奪うための大作戦を実行することになった。クガネの望海楼の入口付近から屋根に上り、楽座街の提灯を吊った縄の上にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76501 /var>」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_05<tab>You carry out Jacke's creative plan to perfection, and send Zakuro running to the baths in utter horror. Infiltrate the Bokairo, and search for the scroll in the changing baskets while a somewhat-unwilling Oboro and Jacke keep Zakuro occupied with their manly wiles.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_05<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76501 /var>で待機して、作戦を実行した。次はクガネの望海泉にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76601 /var>」を調べて「巻物」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_06<tab>You search the baskets by the entrance to the baths, but the scroll is nowhere to be seen. Mayhap there is somewhere you haven't yet looked?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_06<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76601 /var>を調べたが、巻物は見当たらなかった。望海泉にあるもうひとつの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76701 /var>」を調べて「巻物」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_07<tab>You search another set of baskets, but to no avail. Wherever could Zakuro have hidden the scroll?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_07<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76701 /var>を調べたが、巻物は見当たらなかった。望海泉の奥の方にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76801 /var>」を調べて「巻物」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_08<tab>You search the baskets in the innermost chamber of the bathhouse, where you successfully recover the scroll with Zakuro none the wiser. Make haste back to the alley and share the news of your success with your friends.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_08<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76801 /var>を調べて、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCD01 /var>を入手した。作戦は成功した。第二波止場の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76901 /var>」で待機しよう。

source:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_09<tab>Oboro and Jacke rejoice at the success of the mission. The shinobi's mood, however, darkens considerably upon seeing what the scroll actually is─a forbidden summoning mudra and ancient treasure of his village that went missing in the Garlean invasion of twenty-five years past. It would seem that the scroll slept untouched in an imperial vault until it was stolen by Zakuro and her minions at the behest of their mysterious client. As Oboro ponders who outside his village might have knowledge of the scroll, Karasu Redbeak appears in a puff of smoke, revealing that he was the one pulling the strings behind the operation on behalf of his new master, and threatening physical harm to Tsubame, V'kebbe, and Underfoot─who he has captured in the meantime─if you do not return the scroll to him. Issuing an enigmatic warning of some challenge to come, he disappears as quickly as he came, leaving you and your companions at an utter loss. Continue to hone your skill in the art of ninjutsu, that you may be ready for whatever deadly game the crow has in store for you.

※The next ninja quest will be available from Oboro upon reaching level 65.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SEQ_09<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76901 /var>で待機して、オボロとジャックと合流した。オボロによると<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCD01 /var>は、「禁忌口寄せの術」が封じられた危険な物だという。カラスが現れて、ツバメとペリム・ハウリムとヴァ・ケビをさらったという。巻物は取り戻したが、仲間を奪われてしまった。仲間の救出に向けて、己を高めておこう。

※忍者のレベルが65以上になると、クガネのオボロから次の忍者クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_YOUMEI_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have a letter for you from Master Oboro. It would appear that his investigation in Kugane has borne fruit. Here, see for yourself.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_YOUMEI_000_000<tab>これは、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>様。
クガネへ向かったオボロ様より、文が届いております。

source:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_001<tab>(-Letter from Oboro-)Dear <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>,
I hope this letter finds you well. After a long and rather uneventful voyage, we have arrived safely in Kugane. Captain Jacke seems quite taken with Hingan culture, and is enjoying a stroll in the pleasure quarters at this very moment.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_001<tab>(-オボロからの手紙-)前略、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
あれから、船旅を無事に終え、クガネへと到着した。
ジャック殿は、異国の街並みを物珍しそうに見物している。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_002<tab>(-Letter from Oboro-)But forgive me, you are not interested in a diary of our travels. As for the matter of the scroll, rumors abound of a band of Doman scofflaws have been causing a stir in town of late. Putting together the accounts we have heard, the good Captain and I are convinced that these are the thieves we seek.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_002<tab>(-オボロからの手紙-)そして、この港街に巻物を盗んだドマの者らしき、
荒くれ者の集団が滞在していることを確認した。
奴らは思いのほか厄介な相手のようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_003<tab>(-Letter from Oboro-)If the word about town is to be believed, these individuals are far more dangerous than we had imagined. I trust that you have been pursuing your ninjutsu training with your usual diligence? My apologies─of course you have. In any event, we would have you join us at your earliest convenience. We will be keeping an eye out for your arrival. Seek us in the alley behind the second pier ferry docks. Safe travels, friend.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_003<tab>(-オボロからの手紙-)任務を確実に遂行するため、お主の力を貸してほしい。
我らは、クガネの第二波止場の路地裏にて待っているぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_YOUMEI_000_004<tab>It is good to see Master Oboro in good spirits once more. Ever since the elders commanded him to remain here in Eorzea, he has not quite been himself.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_YOUMEI_000_004<tab>この文からすると、オボロ様はとても機嫌がよさそうです。
里の長老から、エオルゼアでの待機を命じられてからというもの、
ため息をついてばかりだったのですが……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_YOUMEI_000_005<tab>After all, a shinobi without a duty to carry out is as a hawk with clipped wings. It is good to see Master Oboro soaring high once more.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_YOUMEI_000_005<tab>久々に忍びらしい任務を得て、張り切っておられるのでしょう。
忍びは任務あってのものですからね。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_YOUMEI_000_006<tab>Still, I worry. Though I have great respect for the man, he can often be too trusting for his own good. Pray go to his side, friend, and see that he does not get himself into undue trouble. May the kami carry you safely across the sea.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_YOUMEI_000_006<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>様も、どうかクガネに赴いて、
第二波止場の路地裏で待つ「オボロ」様に、協力をお願いします。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_YOUMEI_000_010<tab>Master Oboro awaits you in Kugane. I wish you a safe journey.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_YOUMEI_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>様、どうかクガネに赴いて、
第二波止場の路地裏で待つ「オボロ」様に、協力をお願いします。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_011<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What took ye so long? Have ye snilched the rum doxies in the pleasure district? I'm likin' this place more and more by the day!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_011<tab>たまには、旅もいいもんだな……って、
ダメだダメだ……つい、仕事を忘れそうになっちまったぜ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_012<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It has been too long. To have traveled so far to assist Oboro in his mission─words cannot begin to convey my gratitude.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_012<tab>お久しぶりです、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>様。
オボロ様が、いつもお世話になっています。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I thank you for answering my call. Tsubame, too, has made the journey from the village to join us in retrieving the scroll.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、遠くまでよく来てくれたな。
忍びの里から、ツバメにも駆けつけてもらったぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_021<tab>It is an honor to stand by your side again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Master Oboro will doubtless benefit from your presence, as he always does.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_021<tab>お久しぶりです、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>様。
オボロ様が、いつもお世話になっています。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_022<tab>Likewise, I figured we could use a few more dimber dambers on the job, so I've sent for Underfoot and the Stray. Their ship should be pullin' into harbor afore long.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_022<tab>双剣士ギルドからも、
ペリム・ハウリムとヴァ・ケビを呼んでいる。
まだ到着していないが、そのうち来るだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_023<tab>In the meantime, allow me to share what we have learned. Reliable sources have it that the theft of the scroll is the work of the Garnet League, a notorious band of outlaws feared throughout Doma.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_023<tab>さて、我らが追う巻物を盗んだドマ人たちの正体だが、
奴らは「柘榴衆」という、悪名高きドマの落ち武者集団であった。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_024<tab>When the Doman rebellion was crushed one year ago, many a samurai fled the battlefield to escape the Empire's wrath. Dishonored and unable to return home, most turned to banditry to eke out a living. It is the most lethal of these warriors who formed the Garnet League.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_024<tab>1年前の反乱で敗北し、帝国の落人狩りを逃げ延びて、
反乱軍に戻ることもなく、そのまま野盗と化した連中だ。
奴らは、盗み、略奪、殺人、生きるためには何にでも手を染める。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_025<tab>Cutting down innocent men for their coinpurses, plundering villages... The men and women of the Garnet will gladly stain their hands with blood as long as it means they will live to see the morrow.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_025<tab>だが、そんな柘榴衆がどうして、エオルゼアに亡命を求めて、
巻物を盗んで逃げたのか、そして、その巻物の所在はどこか……。
まだまだ、わからぬことが多い。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_026<tab>Why they covet that scroll so, I cannot say. What I do know is that if we do not stop them, they are all but certain to leave a trail of corpses in their wake. We must move, and quickly.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_026<tab>そこで、手分けして、街中にいる柘榴衆たちに、
「かくれ」ながら近づき、会話を盗み聞きして情報を集めよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_027<tab>Fortunately, they should not prove hard to find. Confident in their ability to cut down anyone who dares oppose them, they take little trouble to conceal themselves. On the contrary, they parade their garnet-hued kimono for all to see. You can distinguish them from the similarly garbed Sekiseigumi by their lack of a hakama and their singularly uncouth demeanor.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_027<tab>柘榴衆は皆、柘榴色、つまり赤色の着物を着ている。
だが、くれぐれも赤誠組の隊士と間違わないように、
袴をはいてない荒くれ者をあたってくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_028<tab>Let us split up and cover as much ground as we can. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I would entrust the Shiokaze Hostelry and the Rakuza District to you. Keep to the shadows, and gather what knowledge you can. When we are done with the task, let us reconvene here.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_028<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、「潮風亭」と「楽座街」を頼む。
情報が集まったら、またここに集合しよう。
それでは、「かくれ」ながら近づくのを忘れずにな。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>These men look to be members of the Garnet League. They seem to be discussing something...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>柘榴衆らしき者たちが、何やら話し始めた……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_031<tab>One day she has us sneakin' into a bleedin' imperial storehouse, and the next the Confederacy's chasin' us halfway across the Ruby Sea. Zakuro could pay us twice what she does and it wouldn't be bloody worth it.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_031<tab>まったく、ザクロ姐さんは、人使いが荒いぜ……。
巻物を盗むために、帝国軍の倉庫に忍び込まされたかと思えば、
海賊衆相手の追いかけっこだろう？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEB02949_000_032<tab>Come now. Even you must admit it was quite the little adventure. Though it was fortunate that we came upon those Eorzean pirates when we did─and that they believed our little ruse. In the end, we made it here with our little prize, did we not? We simply took a slight detour.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEB02949_000_032<tab>確かに命がいくつあっても足りんな。
だが、エオルゼアの海賊に出会ったおかげで、逃げおおせた。
まあ、ヤンサからクガネへ渡るはずが、随分と遠回りになったがな。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_033<tab>We didn't <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> make it─or have ye forgotten those we left behind at Bloodshore? Cut down by our pursuers, no doubt. The poor bastards... Whose brilliant idea was it to go along with that masked man's plan, anyway?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_033<tab>ケッ、そのせいで仲間を犠牲にするはめになったんだ。
それも、怪しげな奴の口車に乗せられてよ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_034<tab>If our brothers could not fend for themselves, they have only themselves to blame. As for our mysterious benefactor, he led us here as promised, did he not? Now we need only wait for our client to show and deliver the goods, and we will never need worry about going hungry again.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_034<tab>あいつの助言で、エオルゼアから難なく逃れることができたのだぞ。
あとは、ひんがしの国の依頼人を待ち、巻物を渡すだけ。
そうすれば、俺たちはこの国で餓えることなく暮らせるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_035<tab>Speakin' of which, just how long does our man mean to keep us waitin'? I'm beginnin' to wonder if someone isn't playin' all of us for fools.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_035<tab>さあ、どうだかねぇ……依頼人はいつまで待たせる気なんだ？
俺たちはザクロ姐さん共々、騙されているんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_036<tab>Now, now. We were late with our delivery, after all. Word has it our client returned to Koshu when we did not show, and now is making the long journey back to Kugane. We owe him some patience, do we not?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_036<tab>こちらが遅れたせいで、クガネで待っていた依頼人が、
コウシュウの国元まで帰ってしまったのだ。
もう一度、来てもらうまで、待たされるのは仕方がないだろ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_037<tab>One day she has us sneakin' into─hey, why don't you mind yer own bloody business?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_037<tab>まったく、ザクロ姐さんは……

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEB02949_000_038<tab>My friend here has a bit of a temper. You'd be wise to leave him alone.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEB02949_000_038<tab>おっと、黙るんだ。
怪しげな奴が、こちらを見ているぞ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>The Garnet League men are not likely to divulge any secrets in the presence of strangers. Move out of eyeshot and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>hide<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> yourself in the shadows before approaching them again.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>柘榴衆らしき者が、何やら言いかけたようだ……。
彼らから距離をとり、「かくれ」て再度近づけば、
情報を得られるかもしれない……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_045<tab>We're not puttin' on a bloody show here. Piss off!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_000_045<tab>見世物じゃねえぞ、失せやがれ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEB02949_000_046<tab>I am not in the habit of talking to strangers. If you have business, state it. If not, begone.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEB02949_000_046<tab>何だ？　用がないなら去れ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_100_045<tab>I'll believe it when I bloody see it...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEA02949_100_045<tab>さあ、どうだかねぇ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEB02949_100_046<tab>Have patience, friend. Just a bit longer, and the lives we have always wanted will be ours!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEB02949_100_046<tab>もう少しの辛抱で、俺たちはこの国で暮らせるんだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>These men look to be members of the Garnet League. They seem to be discussing something...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>柘榴衆らしき者たちが、立ち話を始めた……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_000_051<tab>I-I swear, I just wanted to see what all the fuss was about! Barely put a finger on the thing, and next I knew it, Zakuro's blade was at my throat! I-I thought she was going to cut me down right on the spot!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_000_051<tab>やっぱりおっかねぇな、ザクロ姐さんは。
あの巻物をよ、どんな大層なものかと手に取っただけで、
鬼のように怒って、もう少しで叩き斬られるところだった。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLED02949_000_052<tab>Put yourself in her shoes. They say our client is such a dangerous man he's been known to kill those who renege on their agreements. If anything happened to the scroll, her life─and ours─would be as good as forfeit.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLED02949_000_052<tab>そりゃ、姐さんは姐さんで、依頼人に怯えてるのさ。
例の巻物を渡せなかったら、そいつに殺されるって話だからな。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_000_053<tab>Y-You're sayin' she's as scared as us? Zakuro Brightblood, who single-handedly cut down a hundred Garleans in a day during the rebellion? Zakuro Brightblood, who dyes her hair red with the blood of her foes?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_000_053<tab>ザクロ姐さんが怯えるってか？
反乱のときに帝国兵を百人斬りして、その返り血で、
髪の毛が真っ赤に染まったと噂される、あの「鮮血のザクロ」だぞ？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLED02949_000_054<tab>She cuts an imposing figure, this is true. But deep down, she's actually quite the sensitive type.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLED02949_000_054<tab>ああ見えて、繊細なんだよ。
本当は、女らしくて、かわいいところもあるんだぜ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_000_055<tab>S-Sensitive!? Don't make me laugh...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_000_055<tab>まさか、冗談はよしてくれよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_000_056<tab>I-I swear, I just wanted to─ah, was I sayin' something? N-No, I don't believe I was...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_000_056<tab>やっぱり……い、いや……何でもねぇ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>The Garnet League men are not likely to divulge any secrets in the presence of strangers. Move out of eyeshot and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>hide<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> yourself in the shadows before approaching them again.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>柘榴衆らしき者が、何やら言いかけたようだ。
彼らから距離をとり、「かくれ」て再度近づけば、
情報を得られるかもしれない……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_000_058<tab>Wh-What is it? C-Can't you see we're discussin' important matters here?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_000_058<tab>な、なんだよ？　あっちへ行けよ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLED02949_000_059<tab>You seem lost, friend. I suggest you get found, and quickly. Kugane is not friendly to those who go looking in the wrong places.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLED02949_000_059<tab>なんだい？　顔になんかついてるかい？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_100_058<tab><var 1A 02 /var>S-Sensitive<var 1A 01 /var>! H-Hah, that's rich!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLEC02949_100_058<tab>冗談はよしてくれよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLED02949_100_059<tab>I tell you, she really is quite charming when you get to know her...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKUROPEOPLED02949_100_059<tab>ザクロ姐さん、女らしくて、かわいいところもあるんだぜ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_065<tab>Seems the long journey's dulled ol' Jacke's wattles. Hope ye had better luck than I.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_065<tab>いまいち、いい情報が聞けなかったぜ。
……長旅に疲れて、勘が鈍ったかな。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_066<tab>There is an air about you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I can tell you have grown even stronger since last we met.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_066<tab>ふふふ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>様。
一段と、たくましくなられましたね。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_070<tab>It would seem we have everyone assembled. Excellent─let us share all we have learned.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_070<tab>皆、情報を集めることができたようだな。
それでは、各々が聞いてきた話をすりあわせてみよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_071<tab>Allow me to see if I have this right. So, in short, the Garnet League lifted the scroll from a Garlean storehouse at the bidding of an unknown Hingan client. They meant to sail straight from Yanxia to Kugane, but ran afoul of the Confederacy─doubtless because they were too poor to pay the Ruby Tithe.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_071<tab>……なるほど、件の巻物はもともと帝国の倉庫にあったもので、
奴らはひんがしの国の者に、依頼されて盗んだというわけか。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_072<tab>In fleeing, they were then captured by the Krakens, so they claimed to be Doman refugees seeking asylum. Upon arriving in Eorzea, they made off with the scroll, and eventually found safe passage to Kugane─with Karasu's aid? That one's motives remain as inscrutable as ever...but I digress.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_072<tab>ヤンサからクガネに渡ろうとして、
海賊衆に追われたのは、帆別銭を払ってなかったからだろう。
その後、百鬼夜行に捕まって、亡命を装い逃げたのだな。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_073<tab>Furthermore, they are led by one Zakuro Brightblood, about whom no small number of tall tales are told. Regardless of their veracity, there can be no doubting that she is a formidable opponent.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_073<tab>そして、ザクロと呼ばれている女が頭領ということか。
帝国兵を百人斬った女侍の噂は耳にしたことがあったが、
自分の名を掲げて徒党を組むとは、大層な自信家らしい……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_074<tab>For my part, I heard that she is most protective of the scroll, and keeps it on her person at all times─night and day.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_074<tab>私が集めた情報によると、目標である巻物は、
そのザクロが、肌身離さず常に持ち歩いているようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_075<tab>I heard that Zakuro and her followers have rented a room at the Bokairo, an inn in town famous for its hot spring baths.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_075<tab>私が聞いた話では、ザクロの滞在先は「望海楼」とのこと。
ただし、疑り深い性格らしく、仲間にも巻物を触れさせないとか。
宿に忍び込んで盗むのは、難しいでしょう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_076<tab>All ol' Jacke managed to whiddle is that the cove is right fond o' her flowin' locks. An' that she fancies herself a cup o' tea, makin' the trip from the inn to the teahouse and back at least thrice a day.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_076<tab>俺が得た情報は役に立ちそうもないな。
そのザクロってのは、長い髪の毛が自慢で、
大の甘い物好きらしく、よく宿と茶屋を往復しているんだとさ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_077<tab>That is most...enlightening, Captain Jacke. Now, we must find a way to get our hands on the scroll before Zakuro's client arrives─but how? We could challenge her to single combat, but the Sekiseigumi would not look kindly on that.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_077<tab>うーむ……ザクロが巻物を手放すことがないとなると、
倒して奪い取るしかなさそうだが、クガネでの刃傷沙汰は御法度。
事を荒立てては赤誠組に捕まってしまう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_078<tab>Besides, we are shinobi, are we not? We must use stealth to our advantage. We simply need a plan...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_078<tab>だが、依頼人の手に渡ってしまう前に奪わないと、
さらに厄介なことになりそうだ……どうしたものか。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_PERIMUHAURIMU_000_080<tab>Look out below! Underfoot's on the scene. Good to see ye again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Can't wait to snilch the new tricks ye've learned from yer friends here.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_PERIMUHAURIMU_000_080<tab>アニキ、到着しましたよ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も、忍びの皆さんも元気そうで何より。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_VKEBBE_000_081<tab>What's a mort got to do to get herself some sushi? I'm bloody starved! And what's with all these bleedin' seagulls? I swear, if another one takes a shite on my hair, it'll be seagull stew for dinner tonight!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_VKEBBE_000_081<tab>おなかがすいたな……お寿司、おいしそうだった。
それにしても、ウミネコが多いね。
フンでも落とされたら大変……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_079<tab>Wait...that's it! V'kebbe, yer a bloody genius─an' so am I, I reckon.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_079<tab>いい作戦が浮かんだぞ！
それも、俺の情報が役に立ちそうだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_082<tab>Gather 'round and lend me yer wattles, friends─ol' Jacke's got a plan!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_082<tab>よし、みんな揃ったところで、大作戦の発表といこう。
いいか、よく聞いてくれよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_083<tab>First, we catch Zakuro as she's beatin' her way from the inn to the teahouse. Underfoot, V'kebbe, Tsubame─you three'll be in charge of causin' a scene and stoppin' the mort in her tracks.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_083<tab>まずは、宿から茶屋の間の楽座街を歩くザクロを狙って、
前に立ち塞がるなりして、足止めをする。
その役は、ペリム・ハウリムとヴァ・ケビ、ツバメさんに頼もう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_084<tab>Meanwhile, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You make your way to that perch atop the markets, an' drop some imitation seagull shite down from above.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_084<tab>そして、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
お前に、通りの提灯を吊っている縄の上で待機しててもらい、
鳥のフンを模したものを、ザクロの頭上に落とすんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_085<tab>What with her precious locks all mucked up, the mort's sure to make for the hot springs. She can't very well bring the scroll into the water, so we just follow along─all stealthy-like─an' heave it from whatever basket she's stowed it away in.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_085<tab>すると、ザクロは汚れてしまった、
自慢の髪を洗うため、きっと温泉に入るはず。
さすがに、そのときばかりは巻物を手放し、棚にでも隠すだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_086<tab>For good measure, Oboro and I'll head to the bathhouse as well an' keep the girl occupied until <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has the scroll safely in <var 08 E905 (('er)) (('is)) /var> daddles!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_086<tab>念のため、俺とオボロで温泉に入ったザクロの動きを止める。
その間に<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が、温泉の棚を調べて、
手放した巻物を頂戴するという大作戦だ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_087<tab>A most impressive plan, Captain Jacke. But I have one question: how do you propose that the two of us keep Zakuro...occupied?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_087<tab>……な、なるほど、とても私には思いつかぬ奇抜な作戦だ。
だが、ひとつ引っかかるのだが、私とジャック殿で、
ザクロの動きを止めるとは……いったい、どうするというのだ？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_088<tab>Oboro, surely you remember our visit to Bronze Lake, and the little show I put on for our pirate friend? It's all quite simple, really.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_088<tab>オボロ様、私が以前にブロンズレイクで、
体を張って相手を油断させたことを思い出してください。
今度は、あなた様の出番ということですよ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_089<tab>I am not certain I understand what you─oh. On second thought, I am not quite convinced this is the best course of action...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_089<tab>そ、そうか……なんとなく、わかったぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_090<tab>Ahaha! Give yerself some more credit, lad. Now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Ye'll want to climb up to the roof atop the Bokairo, an' then make your way across to the wire atop the markets.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_090<tab>それじゃ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
まずは「望海楼」の入口近くから、屋根の上に登って、
楽座街の提灯を吊っている「縄の上」で待機していてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_091<tab>Here, this white dye should do a suitable seagull shite impersonation. Once Underfoot and the gang lure Zakuro into position, let 'er fly.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_091<tab>その下で、ペリム・ハウリムたちが、ザクロを足止めしたら、
この白の染料を渡しておくので、奴の頭上に落とし、
すぐさま隠れるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_092<tab>All right, lads and lasses, look sharp! We'll meet back here once all's bob.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_092<tab>成功したら、次は「望海泉」の棚を調べて「巻物」を頂戴してくれ。
すべてうまくいったら、またこの場所で合流しよう。
よーし、作戦開始といこうぜ、野郎ども！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_100_095<tab>Quite the plan, eh? Ol' Jacke's still got it in him.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_100_095<tab>さあ、この上にある「縄の上」で待機してくれ。
「望海楼」の入口近くから、屋根の上に登れば行けるはずだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_VKEBBE_000_100<tab>The pain... Oh, the pain!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_VKEBBE_000_100<tab>うう……おなかが……おなかが……

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_101<tab>My poor girl! Whatever is the matter?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_TSUBAME_000_101<tab>ど、どうされました？　大丈夫ですか？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_PERIMUHAURIMU_100_101<tab>Someone, anyone, find a healer! The girl needs help!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_PERIMUHAURIMU_100_101<tab>た、大変だ！
そこのあなた、お医者まで連れてってくれませんか？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKURO_000_102<tab>What was─? Gah! Bird shite!? Oh, bloody <var 1A 02 /var>brilliant<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKURO_000_102<tab>うわっ！　なにっ？　鳥のフン！？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_VKEBBE_000_103<tab>Thank you, kind sir and madam. But worry not─I am not ill. You see, I simply haven't had a bite to eat all day.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_VKEBBE_000_103<tab>おなかが…………減った。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_PERIMUHAURIMU_000_104<tab>Ahaha! Is that all, now? Fortunately, the Shiokaze Hostelry is but a short walk away, and I hear their sushi is positively to <var 1A 02 /var>die<var 1A 01 /var> for. Shall we?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_PERIMUHAURIMU_000_104<tab>なんだ、心配しちゃいましたよ……。
そういや、お腹が減りましたね、
潮風亭に寿司でも食べに行きますか？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKURO_000_105<tab>My hair! My beautiful hair! <sigh> Back to the bathhouse, I suppose...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKURO_000_105<tab>クソッ！　手入れした髪が台無しじゃないか。
ああ、早く洗わないと……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You search the basket, but to no avail. The scroll must be around here somewhere...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>棚に巻物は見当たらなかった。
もうひとつの棚を調べよう……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_115<tab>What beautiful locks you have! However do you keep them so smooth and silky?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_115<tab>キ、キレイな……髪で……ござるな……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_116<tab>I've seen many a rum doxy in my day, but ain't none what compare to you, milady.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_116<tab>キミ、かわいいね、うん、ホントかわいいよ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKURO_000_117<tab>Truly? I do not mean to boast, but they <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> say my beauty is sung of far and wide...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_ZAKURO_000_117<tab>え、ヤダ……そうかしら……？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>You search the basket, but to no avail. The scroll must be around here somewhere...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>棚に巻物は見当たらなかった。
奥の方にも、棚があるようだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_130<tab>Well done, my friends! The operation was, by any measure, a rousing success. That said, I have not seen Tsubame and the others─I do hope all is well.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_130<tab>作戦は大成功であった！
ツバメが見当たらなかったが、そのうち戻ってくるであろう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_131<tab>Now <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> was some rum fun, if I do say so meself. As for the cove, I wouldn't fret─like as not V'kebbe and Underfoot dragged her off to yaffle on some o' Kugane's finer delicacies.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_131<tab>我ながら無茶な作戦だったが、うまくいったな！
ツバメさんは、ペリム・ハウリムとヴァ・ケビを連れ立って、
本当に寿司でも食いにいったんだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_132<tab>No doubt you are right, Captain Jacke. In the meantime, pray show me the scroll, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I would see just what it is that Zakuro's mysterious employer covets so.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_132<tab>さて、件の巻物を見せてくれないか？
ここまで追ってきた巻物が、いかほどのものか見てみたい。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_133<tab>Why, this is─are my eyes to be believed!? The forbidden mudra of summoning! I had half-thought it just a ghost story meant to strike fear in the hearts of shinobi who would stray from their path.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_133<tab>こ、これは……！
間違いない、我が忍びの里に伝わる、
「禁忌口寄せの術」が封印された巻物ではないか！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_134<tab>Forbidden summoning? I wouldn't know a mudra from me own grandmum, but that sounds right dangersome...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_134<tab>なんだそれは？
響きからして随分とヤバそうな気配だが……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_135<tab>It is indeed, Captain Jacke. The legends say that if the summoner's focus wanes for even a moment, the monstrous beast called forth by this mudra will not hesitate to devour him whole.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_135<tab>そのとおり……術者自身をも危険にさらしかねない、
強力な魔獣を口寄せる術を封じた巻物なのだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_136<tab>Many years ago, it was gifted from our village to the King of Doma─then sealed away, to be used only in the most dire of circumstances. But it was lost in the chaos of the Garlean invasion, and never seen again. So it has been sleeping in an imperial vault all these years...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_136<tab>かつて、忍びの里から守りの要として、ドマの国主に献上されたが、
帝国の侵攻以来、行方知れずになっていたと聞く……。
つまりは略奪されて、倉庫で眠っていたということか。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_137<tab>So even with this bleedin' all-powerful summonin' at their fingertips, the Domans still couldn't hold off the Empire? Guess it wasn't all it was cracked up to be, eh?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_137<tab>守りの要だとしたら、侵略を受けたときには当然、使われたんだろ？
結局、その術を持ってしても、ドマは護れなかったってことか？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_138<tab>On the contrary, we never had the chance to find out. Master Gekkai, who led the shinobi, deemed the risk too great and refused to employ it, even as our nation fell.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_138<tab>いや、当時、ドマの忍びを指揮していたゲッカイは、
扱いきれるものではないと断じて、使用はしなかったらしい。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_139<tab>Whether Master Gekkai plotted his betrayal even then, or whether he had our countrymen's best interests at heart, I cannot say─though I would like to believe the latter.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_139<tab>ゲッカイが帝国側に寝返ったのは、1年前の反乱時……
25年前の戦いで使用しなかったのは、味方をも傷つける、
禁忌の術の恐ろしさを知っていたからだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_140<tab>Nonetheless, it is clear that none in Garlemald knew of the scroll's true power. And so it sat untouched until it was stolen by the Garnet League, at the bidding of some unknown master.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_140<tab>ドマ城の占領により、巻物も敵の手に墜ちたのだろうが、
帝国軍にしてみれば、その価値などわからぬだろうからな。
柘榴衆が盗み出すまで、倉庫に死蔵していたのだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_141<tab>But aside from my fellow shinobi, who out there would know of the scroll's true power? But it matters little now. We have the scroll, and I must return it to its rightful home in my village.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_141<tab>だとすると、この巻物の価値を知り、盗み出させた者とは……？
とにかく……これはもともとドマの物であるからして、
私が里に返さねばならん。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_142<tab>'Fraid I can't let ye do that, friend. I promised the Krakens I'd bring the scroll back for them, an' I'll not have it said that Jacke ain't a man of his whids.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_142<tab>ちょっと待てよ、俺は「百鬼夜行」から依頼を受けて、
その巻物を取り返しに、こんなところまで来たんだ。
悪いが、そういうわけにいかないね。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_143<tab>After all, the scroll's been missin' from your village for twenty-odd summers, no? Clearly no one's sufferin' much.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_143<tab>大体、ずっと行方不明だった物なんだろ？
それが巡り巡って、百鬼夜行の物になったんだから、
ここは、俺に渡してもらわないとな……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_144<tab>That is hardly the issue, Captain Jacke! This scroll is an ancient treasure─it belongs in Doma!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_144<tab>渡すことはできぬ、
これは、れっきとしたドマの物だ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_145<tab>It belongs to those what found it, an' that's the Krakens! Gods, if ye ain't a stubborn bastard...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_145<tab>俺は引き受けた仕事は必ずやり遂げてきたんだ、
こればっかりは引けねぇな！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_146<tab>(-Familiar Voice-)Gentlemen, gentlemen...must you make such a scene? After all, strictly speaking, the scroll <var 1A 02 /var>belongs<var 1A 01 /var> to neither of you.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_146<tab>(-聞き覚えのある声-)ウププ、実はどちらの物でもないんだなァ～。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_147<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_147<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_100_147<tab>Karasu! Wherever did you─? But never mind. Thank you for guiding us here. You may rest assured that the scroll will safely return to Doma. You have my gratitude.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_100_147<tab>カラス！　こんなところにまで現れるとは……！
しかし、お前のおかげで、ここまで導かれ、
巻物を取り返すことができたぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_148<tab>Oh, Oboro─my dear, sweet, deluded Oboro. You grow ever dimmer by the day. Do you truly believe that I do what I do for <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_148<tab>はぁ～、相変わらず鈍いなァ～。
言っとくけどォ、協力したつもりはないヨォ～。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_149<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> say that I was pulling all the strings in this little puppet play, did I not? Very well, allow me to put it in words even you can understand: the scroll belongs in Hingashi─to the master I now serve.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_149<tab>ボクがあそこで現れて、ここにも現れたらァ～、
この件、裏で手を引いてるのはボクだって、早く気づけヨォ～。
その巻物は、ひんがしの国の物、そして……我が新たな主君の物サ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_150<tab>My mistake was in entrusting to Zakuro and her lackies what I should have seen to myself from the very start. Oh well, live and learn, I suppose!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_150<tab>ザクロがヘマして、我が主はカンカンなもんで、
今後はボクが指揮を任されることになったから、よろしくネェ～。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_151<tab>In any event, allow me to propose a simple transaction. You hand over the scroll, and I return your friends to you with their heads still attached to their bodies. A fair trade, no?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_151<tab>あ、そうそう、そっちは、巻物を得たかもしれないけどォ、
こっちは、ツバメちゃんと、双剣使いのふたりを預かったヨォ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_152<tab>Karasu, you craven─!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_152<tab>なっ、なんだって……！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_153<tab>On second thought... Ahahaha! Yes, I do believe we could have even more fun. Keep your eyes and ears out, dim one─you'll be hearing from me again soon.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_KARASU_000_153<tab>どう遊ぼうか思いついたら、また連絡するからァ～、
それじゃぁまたねェ～、ププププ～。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_154<tab>Curse it all! And here I believed the man had turned over a new leaf after leaving Gekkai. But no, it would seem he has simply found another villain to serve.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_154<tab>クソッ！　ツバメがさらわれてしまった！
あいつめ、新たな主君だと……ふざけおって！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_155<tab>Once a rook, always a rook, I reckon. An' a sharp one, at that─Underfoot and the Stray aren't the types to get boned so easily.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_JACKE_000_155<tab>チッ、ペリム・ハウリムとヴァ・ケビまで狙われるとは……。
こりゃ、巻物どころじゃなくなっちまった……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_156<tab>As long as we have the scroll, Karasu is not like to cause our friends any harm. And yet, he is as unpredictable an adversary as they come. We must proceed with caution.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_156<tab>しかし、こちらに巻物がある以上、皆も無事なはず……。
こうなると、カラスからの連絡を待つほかない。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_157<tab>Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It would mean much to me if you would remain in Kugane until our work here is through. Pray continue to train in your ninjutsu, and I shall call upon you again when the time is right.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN630_02949_OBORO_000_157<tab>すまぬ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
巻物の奪還は果たしたが、更なる問題が起きてしまった。
何か進展があれば、またお主の力を貸してほしい。
